tags.name: CompanyNumberTypes
tags.description: Interface for retrieving company number types

tags.name: CompanyGroupTypes
tags.description: Interface for retrieving company group types

tags.name: About
tags.description: Interface for retrieving information about the pnet-data-api

get.description: Retrieves some basic informations about the data API.
Retrieves a ResultPage containing activities that match the requested matchcodes.

parameters.name: pp
parameters.description: the number of items per page

get.description: Retrieves an activity with a specific matchcode.

Finds multiple activities each matching all specified restrictions. If one or more restrictions are set each restriction will be applied (AND) and one of the values of each restriction must match (OR).

parameters.name: pp
parameters.description: the number of items per page

parameters.name: up
parameters.description: updated after the specified date and time

get.description: Searches for activities with the specified query. If one or more filters are set each filter will be applied (AND) and one of the values of each filter must match (OR).

parameters.name: pp
parameters.description: the number of items per page

get.description: Returns multiple companies each matching all specified restrictions. If one or more restrictions are set each restriction will be applied (AND) and one of the values of each restriction must match (OR).

parameters.name: commercialRegisterNumber
parameters.description: one or more FB numbers, the case does not matter

parameters.name: companyNumber
parameters.description: one or more company numbers, works with and without trimmed zeros

parameters.name: dataProcessingRegisterNumber
parameters.description: one or more DVR numbers, the case does not matter

parameters.name: iban
parameters.description: one or more IBANs, the case does not matter

parameters.name: pp
parameters.description: the number of items per page

parameters.name: sapNumber
parameters.description: one or more SAP numbers, works with and without trimmed zeros

parameters.name: vatIdNumber
parameters.description: one or more VAT ID numbers, the case does not matter

get.description: Retrieves a company with a specific id.

Finds multiple companies each matching all specified restrictions. If one or more restrictions are set each restriction will be applied (AND) and one of the values of each restriction must match (OR).

parameters.name: externalBrand
parameters.description: the matchcodes of the external brand

parameters.name: headquarter
parameters.description: the ids of the headquarter companies

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: one or more GeoPoints (langitude, latitude and the allowed distance to that intersection

parameters.name: pp
parameters.description: the number of items per page

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: the matchcode of the company type

parameters.name: up
parameters.description: updated after the specified date and time

get.description: Searches for companies with the specified query. If one or more filters are set each filter will be applied (AND) and one of the values of each filter must match (OR).

parameters.name: externalBrand
parameters.description: the matchcodes of the external brand

parameters.name: headquarter
parameters.description: the ids of the headquarter companies

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: one or more GeoPoints in the format: {"lat":47.817,"lon":13.051,"distance":100.0} (distance in meters)

parameters.name: pp
parameters.description: the number of items per page

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: the matchcode of the company type

parameters.description: the ids of companies of the user's advisor assigments

parameters.description: the number of items per page

parameters.description: the personnel numbers of the supervisors

id.description: The unique id of the person

lastName.description: The last name of the person

lastUpdate.description: The time and date when the person was last changed

numbers.description: The number types the person has at specific companies
